title: Map the nodes function name to the GatherNodesStream
description:
This ticket maps the nodes function name to the GatherNodesStream. The gatherNodes function name will also remain mapped. 

I think nodes is just a better name for this function. Gather was meant to signify a breadth first traversal, but I think the docs can make this clear.

I'll update the docs as well and mention that both function names work, but in the future gatherNodes may be phased out.
